name: The Fate of An Unlovable Man
name_original: The Fate of An Unlovable Man
description:
Narrated By The Loveliest Man On Earth ;D

Johnny has done too poorly in life and it seems like fate will be turning sour for him. How dreary… So, I, Waldo, out of the kindness of my heart, have decided to let you play for his fate. Feeling lucky? :)

“The Fate of An Unlovable Man” is an interactive branching short story game for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. You may re-read it multiple times in order to get different endings.

*Trigger warning: This game contains some sensitive themes such as murder, suicide, and firearms. We made an effort to avoid gore and excessive violence.* Credits:

Narrative Design / 2D Digital Art - Nicolette Bond

3D Modeling / Programming / Visual Effects - Zachary Laurin

2D Digital Art - Othman Lawand

Additional 2D Digital Art - Ilka Grahl

Controls:

- Use the Mouse to move the view around

- Use the Left Mouse Button to interact with the dice (which will continue the story)

- Press R to restart the game

- Use Alt-F4 to shut down the game

IMPORTANT:

You have to download the game to play it, we unfortunately could not get it to run in WebGL.
